biography_text: STAUBER, Peter, a Representative from Minnesota; born in Duluth, St. Louis County, Minn., May 10, 1966; graduated from Denfeld High School, Duluth, Minn., 1984; B.S., Lake Superior State University, Sault Sainte Marine, Mich., 1990; professional athlete; police officer; member of the Hermantown, Minn., city council, 2001-2005, 2011-2013; member of the St. Louis County, Minn., board of commissioners, 2013-2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: Lake Superior State University, Sault Sainte Marine, Mich.
